title: My first Post!
excerpt: Working on my new Website and this is the first post. CS update: Trying to find an internship, hope it works out!!
content: Working on my new Website and this is the first post. CS update: Trying to find an internship, hope it works out!!

title: I got an Internship
excerpt: I was able to get an internship this summer. Its at a startup called rMark Bio. The company uses AI to try and bring together partners in the bio tech and pharma industries for collaboration. So far I have written an API unit test suite for one of their APIs using the Jest testing frame work. Through this I have become familiar with Node.js and increased my fluency with Git. I’m excited to see what else I can get done this summer!
content: I was able to get an internship this summer. Its at a startup called rMark Bio. The company uses AI to try and bring together partners in the bio tech and pharma industries for collaboration. So far I have written an API unit test suite for one of their APIs using the Jest testing frame work. Through this I have become familiar with Node.js and increased my fluency with Git. I’m excited to see what else I can get done this summer!
